page.title: 12Living in Idstone
page.content: In Idstone there is a Bus Stop and nearby a red Telephone Box.Therefore you can phone whoever you want to for 10 pence, if you have no private telephone.The travelling Library and the Butcher's Van also stop in Idstone. There are three farms in Idstone and they all have dairies - so no one goes short of milk! The Video Van comes round every Saturday. They sell sweets,crisps and drinks as well. If you are interested in fishing there are 3 ponds of which two have fish in. The disadvantage of Idstone is that we have to cycle to Ashbury or Bishop- stone to go to a shop in the week,or to school. There is not even a Youth Club! Most of my friends live in Ashbury one mile away.
